question:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to Rajya Sabha?
1. It has a term of six year
2. One third of its members retire after every year
3. It can authorise the Parliament to make a law on a subject enumerated in the State List
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: First statement is incorrect because members of Rajya Sabha have a term of 6 year (not Rajya Sabha itself). Second statement is incorrect because One third of its member retire after every two years (not one year). Third statement is correct.
